tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE candidates (
    candidate_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    political_affiliation VARCHAR(50),
    position VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    past_experience TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE candidates (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    political_affiliation VARCHAR(50),
    position VARCHAR(50),
    past_experience TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE campaign_contributions (
    contribution_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    candidate_id INT,
    amount DECIMAL(10,2),
    donor_name VARCHAR(50),
    donor_email VARCHAR(50),
    FOREIGN KEY (candidate_id) REFERENCES candidates(id)
);

CREATE TABLE candidates (
  candidate_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  political_affiliation VARCHAR(50),
  position VARCHAR(50),
  past_experience TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE political_affiliations (
  affiliation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  affiliation_name VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE positions (
  position_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  position_name VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE candidates(
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    political_affiliation VARCHAR(50),
    position VARCHAR(50),
    past_experience TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE campaigns(
    campaign_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    candidate_id INT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    budget DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE candidates (
  candidate_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  political_affiliation VARCHAR(50),
  position VARCHAR(50),
  past_experience TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE campaigns (
  campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  candidate_id INT,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  budget DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE endorsements (
  endorsement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  candidate_id INT,
  endorser_name VARCHAR(50),
  endorsement_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE debates (
  debate_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  topic VARCHAR(100),
  date_time DATETIME,
  moderator_name VARCHAR(50),
  location VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE votes (
  vote_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  candidate_id INT,
  voter_id INT,
  vote_date DATE
)
